verbs.description: < p > President Trump and his lawyers probably [V: wo] n't decide whether to sit down for an interview with Robert Mueller until after the president 's summit with North Korea 's leader , according to Trump 's legal team.</p >

< p > [ARG0: President Trump and his lawyers] [ARGM-ADV: probably] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: decide] [ARG1: whether to sit down for an interview with Robert Mueller until after the president 's summit with North Korea 's leader] , [ARGM-ADV: according to Trump 's legal] team.</p >

< p > [ARG1: President Trump and his lawyers] probably wo n't decide whether to [V: sit] down [ARGM-PRP: for an interview with Robert Mueller] [ARGM-TMP: until after the president 's summit with North Korea 's leader] , according to Trump 's legal team.</p >

< p > President Trump and his lawyers probably wo n't decide whether to sit down for an interview with Robert Mueller until after the president 's summit with North Korea 's leader , [V: according] to Trump 's legal team.</p >
